Machinate {3}{W}{W}
Enchant creature you control
Enchanted creature gets +4/+4, has lifelink and “Whenever this creature attacks, create two 1/0 colorless Spirit creature tokens that are tapped and attacking, then put a +1/+1 counter on each of them,” and is a God.
When enchanted creature dies, return Melchior Mantle to the battlefield.
